headline: AppLovin Corporation (APP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AppLovin Corporation on Compounding Your Wealth’s Substack by Sergey. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on APP. AppLovin Corporation’s share was trading at $651.18 as of September 23rd. APP’s trailing and forward P/E were 89.45 and 48.08, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. AppLovin Corporation (APP) delivered an […]
